text: I'm always on the lookout for new
wonderful delicious easy breakfast ideas
and as toasted muesli with millet is the
best millet is a really delicious
gluten-free grain super high in protein
high in dietary fiber and this is a
great way to incorporate it into your
diet I have half a cup of millet and I'm
going to add 1/3 cup boiling water and
just top it with a plate and let it
stand for about 30 minutes until it's
softened slightly my millet has had time
to soften so let's just strain off the
water here okay it looks good and add
this to two cups of rolled oats to this
add 3/4 cup shelled pistachios and 1/2
cup of coconut flakes I like to use the
large coconut flakes here you can also
use the shredded just make sure you're
going for an unsweetened version now
we're gonna work on the hot stuff I have
half a cup of honey to a small saucepan
and 1 tablespoon coconut oil this is
gonna add a really nice nutty flavor to
that 1 teaspoon of coarse salt this is
gonna help balance out the sweetness of
the honey bring out the flavors of
everything else give this a stir we're
wanting to bring this up to a boil
drizzle this mixture all over our dry
ingredients give it a good toss make
sure everything is nice and evenly
coated already smells great transfer
this to a rimmed baking sheet and make
sure you spread it in an even layer and
this is just gonna help with the baking
make sure everything's crunchy and
golden at the same time so I have my
oven preheated to 325 degrees and we're
gonna bake this until it's just golden
brown about 20 minutes very crunchy you
can hear that it's a great size so add
2/3 cup dried cranberries it's gonna add
a really nice tart sweetness you don't
want to add them when the mixture is too
hot otherwise it will dry them out even
further and make them kind of tough such
a lovely color also the dried fruit adds
a really nice sort of chew to our
crunchy muesli so let's give it a try
one of my favorite ways
to enjoy the muesli is with yogurt of
course I love the creaminess with that
tart crunchy texture just take a little
handful here so beautiful can't wait to
get in let's give it a try
mmm you really get the coconut here
super tasty crunchy wonderful way to
start your day with whole grains
you
